revisions.comment: Clean up [[:Category:Pages using duplicate arguments in template calls|duplicate template arguments]] using [[:en:User:Frietjes/findargdups|findargdups]]
Undid revision [[Special:Diff/1334220555|1334220555]] by [[Special:Contributions/~2026-47109-1|~2026-47109-1]] ([[User talk:~2026-47109-1|talk]])(contentious claim needing sources)
Adds critical Organisations or Forums linked to Capitalism
/* Criticism */ restoring source to appropriate section
/* Further reading */ Restoring book to further reading

/* Criticism */ WP:OVERCITE removed very off-topic sources about revolution, how austerity paves way to fascism, too many redundant sources to the same Karl Marx views with WP:RS WP:NPOV problems (plenty of good sources already provided); removed publisher catalog links WP:PROMO; Hickel is redundant from prior section
/* Eco-capitalism */ No. Eco-socialism is not a term used for Eco-capitalism. Blue greens was piped to Eco-socialism. The paragraph is about eco-capitalism.

/* State */ Removed overquoting from one outdated Economist article that was part of a debate. Many state-owned enterprises are still entirely gov't owned and aren't publicly traded e.g. PetroMex ("gone are the days" is unencyclopedic language); Noam Chomsky isn't a valid source regarding capitalism (he is a professor of linguistics); there wasn't any capitalism when Engels was alive and writing although there was for Lenin
corrected WP:OVERCITE in lead; removed piped definition to Karl Marx defn of capitalist (!!!) from lead; minor grammar fixes; corrected date 1653 Dutch per talk page inquiry and in-article comment
